forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Showers likely along with a possible rumble of thunder in the morning, then partly cloudy late. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
